summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2456, for the improvement of the alley in block 2, McKenzie and Dempsey Addition to the City of Seattle, by grading the alley ten feet in width; by the construction of wooden curb and gutter on the east side of the alley, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 26293 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
